title: Carrie at 50: the bloody history of Stephen King’s audacious debut novel
excerpt: The ‘king of horror’ has published more than 60 novels and sold over 350 million books – but it all began 50 years ago with the tale of a teen misfit with telekinetic powers who gets her first period in the school shower. Jessie Thompson looks back on a great, career-making novel (which King’s wife had to salvage from the bin)

title: Seven Books That Explain How Hollywood Actually Works
excerpt: These titles shed light on an industry that’s always bubbling with drama beneath the surface.
